title: Rise of the Dawn
description: Shanza and Ikeda, two lost souls forced together through circumstance to discover what it means to love. Chosen as the Gods' representatives, danger and deceit lurks around every corner. Will the trials ahead unite them, or destroy them?Status: Incomplete/ongoingLast update: 06/26/2016Word count: aprox. 414,467
author: The Inkslinger
